about_the_game:
Supercharge your Borbs with the Borbventure Pack for Leaf Blower Revolution!

  • Unlock Borbiana Jones
  • Get 5 Common Borbventure Packs instantly
  • Get 3 Rare Borbventure Packs instantly
  • Get 2 Legendary Borbventure Packs instantly
  • Get 3 Common Borbventure Packs per daily reward
  • Get 2 Rare Borbventure Packs per daily reward
  • Get 1 Legendary Borbventure Pack per daily reward
  • 500 + 75 daily Gems
  • Support the developer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Supercharge your Borbs with the Borbventure Pack! Get the following packs per daily reward: 3 Common Packs, 2 Rare Packs, 1 Legendary Pack. Additionally, you'll get 5 Common Packs, 3 Rare Packs, 2 Legendary Packs instantly. There's even more: Unlock Borbiana Jones + 500 Gems instantly + 75 daily!
